title: Start your monster suppression journey!
desc: You will face a lot of lesson monsters. From small monsters to BOSS monsters. Fight these monsters to improve your knowledge of the subject.
title1: Fight your friends with your knowledge!
desc1: It will be most exciting to compete with the best kids and your friends in your class by betting on your knowledge.
desc2: All of the questions you face meet international learning objective standards. So the knowledge you learn from your game will be valued in real life.
title3: Fully equip yourself with the winning token
desc3: Each time you win a battle, you will be rewarded with an ELFC token. With the winning token, you can get your weapons, clothes, protection and skill cards from our marketplace and equip yourself.
